description: Unify header navigation across all pages and add contextual 'View all' links to homepage sections for better content discovery

userStories.title: Use site navigation on homepage
userStories.description: As a visitor on the homepage, I want to see the same navigation as other pages so I can easily find and navigate to any section of the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage header shows site navigation (Concepts dropdown, Reference dropdown, Get Started, Changelog)
Homepage no longer shows anchor-only navigation (What is it?, Primary Agents, etc.)
Dropdown menus work the same as on other pages
Mobile menu shows the same navigation structure
Works in both light and dark mode
userStories.notes: Removed homeNavigation array and isHomePage conditional. Homepage now uses siteNavigation with dropdowns.
userStories.e2eScope: Navigation dropdown menus work on homepage, mobile menu shows same structure

userStories.title: Add 'View all agents' link to Primary Agents section
userStories.description: As a visitor viewing Primary Agents, I want a link to browse all agents so I can explore beyond the featured ones.
acceptanceCriteria: "View all agents →" link appears below the primary agents grid
Link styling is consistent with site design (subtle but visible)
Works in both light and dark mode
userStories.notes: Added View all agents link below primary agents grid.

userStories.title: Make Specialist Categories cards clickable
userStories.description: As a visitor viewing the agent categories (Critics, Developers, Testers, Other), I want to click on a category to see those agents filtered.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking navigates to /agents with that category pre-filtered (e.g., /agents?category=critics)
Cards show hover state indicating they're clickable
"Browse all agents →" link appears below the category grid
Works in both light and dark mode
userStories.notes: Converted category cards to Links with hover states. Added Browse all agents link.
userStories.e2eScope: Category cards link to filtered agents page with correct category param

userStories.title: Add 'View all skills' link to Skills Overview section
userStories.description: As a visitor viewing the skills preview, I want a link to browse all skills so I can explore the full list.
acceptanceCriteria: "View all skills →" link appears below the skills grid (replacing or augmenting "Plus N more" text)
Works in both light and dark mode
userStories.notes: Replaced Plus N more text with View all 26 skills link.

userStories.title: Add link to full Getting Started page
userStories.description: As a visitor reading the Getting Started section, I want a link to a more detailed guide if I need additional help.
acceptanceCriteria: "Full getting started guide →" link appears at the end of the Getting Started section
Works in both light and dark mode
userStories.notes: Added Full getting started guide link at end of section.

userStories.title: Add 'Learn more' link after 'What is it?' section
userStories.description: As a visitor who just read the 'What is an agent system?' explanation, I want a link to deeper conceptual content.
acceptanceCriteria: "Learn more about agents →" link appears at the end of the section
Works in both light and dark mode
userStories.notes: Added Learn more about agents link after explanation.

userStories.title: Update Agents page to support category filter from URL
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the /agents page to read the category filter from URL params so links from homepage work correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: /agents page reads `?category=critics` (or other category) from URL on load
Works with direct navigation and client-side navigation
userStories.notes: Added useSearchParams hook with Suspense boundary. Reads category param on load and initializes filter state.
userStories.e2eScope: URL param filtering works on agents page - navigating to /agents?category=critics shows filtered results
